predictionhandler.usage: Usage: !prediction [open / options / lock / resolve / cancel / sync] [usage / example]
predictionhandler.404: There currently isn't an open prediction
predictionhandler.open.usage: Usage: !prediction open [Time until Auto-Lock (30s to 30m)] "Question (45 char)" "Option 1 (25 char)" "Option 2 (25 char)" (Max 10 Options) - Opens a new prediction
predictionhandler.open.example: Example: !prediction open 5m10s "What will the match outcome be?" "Win" "Loss" "Draw"
predictionhandler.open.toomanyoptions: Too many options. Limit: 10. Need Help? Try "!prediction open usage" or "!prediction open example"
predictionhandler.options.usage: Usage: !prediction options - Prints the option IDs and titles of the current prediction
predictionhandler.options.example: Example: !prediction options - === Options === ## 1: Win ## 2: Loss ## 3: Draw
predictionhandler.lock.usage: Usage: !prediction lock - Locks the prediction early, so viewers can no longer add bets on the outcome
predictionhandler.lock.example: Example: !prediction lock - === Prediction Locked === No more bets
predictionhandler.resolve.usage: Usage: !prediction resolve [Option ID] - Resolves the prediction, awarding channel points to the viewers who bet on the selected option
predictionhandler.resolve.example: Example: !prediction resolve 1 - === What will the match outcome be? === The winning option is: Win
predictionhandler.cancel.usage: Usage: !prediction cancel - Cancels the prediction, refunding all bet channel points
predictionhandler.cancel.example: Example: !prediction cancel - === Prediction Canceled === Points have been refunded
predictionhandler.cancel: === Prediction Canceled === Points have been refunded
predictionhandler.sync.usage: Usage: !prediction sync - Re-syncs the current prediction status
predictionhandler.sync.example: Example: !prediction sync - Prediction state has been synced
